name: Boat Rescue
description:
In this horrible sea, everyone can be in trouble, so your mission is to help that people. Go as fast as you can saving everyone in your incredible lifeguard boat!

If you feel that you are not fast enought, you can always buy upgrades

So take your boat, check the fuel and have fun at becoming the best lifeguard of the sea!

This is a beta version of the game, if you think there is something that can be better just make a comment and i'll fix it.
